SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_system_id, code, description, new_claim_id, pay_claim_id, maintain_claim_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_claim_system WHERE claim_system_id = :claim_system_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT claim_system_id, code, description, new_claim_id, pay_claim_id, maintain_claim_id, GetYesNo(new_claim_id) new_claim, GetYesNo(pay_claim_id) pay_claim, GetYesNo(maintain_claim_id) maintain_claim, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_claim_system WHERE UPPER(description) LIKE UPPER(:description)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_system SET code = :code, description = :description, new_claim_id = :new_claim_id, pay_claim_id = :pay_claim_id, maintain_claim_id = :maintain_claim_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_system_id = :claim_system_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_system ( code, description, new_claim_id, pay_claim_id, maintain_claim_id, created_by, claim_system_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :new_claim_id, :pay_claim_id, :maintain_claim_id, :created_by, :claim_system_id )
